name: Path of (dis)abilities
description:
A strategy card game against time, complete your path with your skills or to get to the end sacrificing them

Tutorial:

This game uses color code for matching .

 Every ability can pass the traps that correspond to its color. 

You can pass using different colors by sacrificing that ability.  

The Triangular shaped cards requires a sacrifice, if you sacrifice the same color you recover a percent of time, but, chose wisely what ability to destroy.

You can add the card to the slot by clicking on it or dragging to the slot
